questions.question: Who was the Communist leader who established the policy? (He has a great mustache)

choices.answer: Vladimir Putin
Joseph Stalin
Vladimir Lenin
Carl Marx
When multiple farmers ran and worked on a joint farm
A farm meant for collecting things
Farming on one's own individual land
Farming using big, industrious machines
Poor farmers who strongly supported Stalin and his policies
People working in the highest levels of the government
People who worked in Industry jobs
Affluent peasants who believed in private ownership of farms

questions.question: Which one of the following was NOT a goal of Stalin's in regard to domestic policy?

choices.answer: Rapidly industrialize the USSR
Make the USSR a Capitalist country
Fully socialize the USSR
Collectivize agriculture in the USSR

questions.question: Which of these was NOT a reason Stalin proposed his collectivization policies?

choices.answer: He needed more grain to both feed workers and sell overseas
He wanted an excuse to eradicate the Kulaks
He wanted to befriend the United States
He wanted more people to join industrial jobs
